name: Mama's Cub
description:
MAMA'S CUB

Mama's Cub is a Game Jam project made in 3 days for the Noroff Winter Jam. (Unreal Engine 5)

The theme for the Jam was: Melting Away

Story

The Penguin Mafia Attacks! You have to protect your cub!

The Ice around you is melting away! You have to keep the Mafia away until there is no more ice for them to attack from.

How to Play

Run with "W". The Bear runs in the direction you are looking.

Attack with "Left Mouse Button". Keep in mind, this dodges you forward a bit.

Pause with "Esc".
